name: Strange Music With Burrowing Creatures
description:
-== TRYPOPHOBIA WARNING! ==-

Play strange little songs with a colony of burrowing creatures in the woods. No goals or threats, only relaxing with some tunes. Entry for the DreamCoreJam.

Controls:

- Click on a creature to assign a note to them.

- Click on a key or use the scroll wheel to change the note you will play.

- Click on the X button then click on a creature to cancel assigned notes.

- Click arrow buttons to move around.
